translation.en: and agents and executives. I mean, the biggest.

translation.en: Of all the places, you know?

translation.en: I feel like that...
could have been the place.
translation.fr: ça aurait pu être mon pays.

translation.en: But then I got scared away when dead chickens started showing up on my gate.

translation.en: I mean, I may not be the smartest Nellie on the block,

translation.en: I know how to take a hint.
Pas de voodoo.
Pas de Port-au-Prince,
so I ended up here.
Bob set me up.
We did a great business.
Every room was filled every single weekend.
translation.fr: On était complet tous les week-ends.

translation.en: And for a while, we ran a beautiful trade with the European set.
translation.fr: On avait lancé un commerce florissant avec l'Europe.

translation.en: But then, a few neighbor-island coups and bombings later,
translation.fr: Mais quelques coups d'État et bombardements plus tard,

translation.en: it trickled down to the backpackers, and then...
translation.fr: les touristes ont commencé à se faire rares.

translation.en: several State Department warnings later, and we were down to this.
translation.fr: Après plusieurs avertissements du gouvernement, on en est là.

translation.en: So, why did you stay?
Why are you still here?
I could ask you the same question.
translation.fr: Je pourrais vous poser la même question.

translation.en: But me, I...
I guess I stayed because I have a very,
translation.fr: je pense que je suis resté parce que...

translation.en: very high tolerance for pleasure.
translation.fr: j'ai un certain attachement au plaisir.

translation.en: Tell Evelina to set the table for three tonight.
translation.fr: Dites à Evelina de dresser la table pour trois.

translation.en: My friend is coming.
Who's that?
My friend. The one I told you about?

translation.en: Bob?
No.
The other friend.
Be a dear, fetch me a refill.
[Paul] I mean, it's not like the vacancy sign
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas comme si le panneau "chambres libres" me coûtait cher en électricité.

translation.en: isn't burning a hole in my electric bill or anything.
translation.fr: le panneau "chambres libres" me coûtait cher en électricité.

translation.en: People we've met here in the past.

translation.fr: Remplis-la de ce que tu veux.

translation.en: Rum punch?

translation.en: Move it in, move it out, who cares?
Just cut me in.

translation.en: We've done this before. [stammering] I told you...
translation.fr: Je te l'ai dit, on a déjà fait ça...

translation.en: ...here in the past.
I can create your future for you.

[yells] Elise!
Oh, fuck it.
Evelina!
Wipe the chairs, Elise.

-Did you tell her something? -[Paul] Of course I didn't tell her.

translation.en: -[Elena] I don't know him. -[Dick] Yeah, you do. You remember.

translation.en: Hey, Maxie.
-Make with the grill and lay on some chow. -Hey, Ellie.
translation.fr: Dépêche-toi de faire griller la bouffe. Salut, Ellie.

translation.en: The sparks won't burn you because...

translation.en: they're cold.

it's usually the end of something, not the beginning.

Is that you?

He's there.
Oh, fuck. Come in.

translation.fr: Je pense qu'il n'y a rien là-bas, rien du tout.

translation.en: Plane will be there at eight o'clock tomorrow.
translation.fr: L'avion sera là à 8 h demain.

translation.en: Easy Rider of the geopolitic,
too cool for the press pool.
Stop. True reporter.

Good.

translation.fr: Des faits marquants se sont déroulés.

translation.en: [Elena] First, I wanted to know who.
Who chose money over life?
translation.fr: Qui préférait l'argent à la vie ?

translation.en: Steel and lead over blood and spirit?
translation.fr: L'acier et le plomb au sang et à l'âme ?

translation.en: Who the war pig?
Who the profiteer?
Who the cold heart, the vapid soul?
[Treat] Elena!
[Elena] And second...
Second, I wanted to know why.
[Treat] Tomorrow.
[Elena] Tomorrow what?
Tomorrow we leave.
[Treat] The suspect then wheeled on me,
translation.fr: La suspecte s'est tournée vers moi,

translation.en: pulling a firearm...
wounding me in the shoulder.
I returned fire...
in course, killing her.
translation.fr: Ce tir lui a été fatal.

translation.en: I think... [sighs]
I think she knew she was caught.
You know...
you think you have it covered,
and find out you don't have it covered worth a goddamn.
translation.fr: Et on se rend compte qu'on ne gère absolument rien.

translation.en: It added all up, but...
it won't bring her back.
[in English] This way, please.
[Jones speaking French] Some would say she was waiting for a payday.

translation.en: I think Elena McMahon got caught in the glare.

translation.en: The water was over her head.
[man] Why'd she do it?
I don't have an answer for that kind of tragedy.

translation.en: The truth is, it's just a hell of a bad outcome.
The last outcome you would ever have wanted.
[Elena] Some real things have happened lately.
translation.fr: Des faits marquants se sont déroulés.

translation.en: But we were moving fast.
We were traveling light.
We were younger.
I was younger.
"All part of...
history's rough draft," we used to say.
translation.fr: du brouillon de l'histoire," comme on disait.

translation.en: History's footnote.
And yet...
Still...
